name: Customer Statement Summary
query:
WITH
customer AS (
SELECT
    name as customer,
    customer_name
FROM
    `tabCustomer`
WHERE
    name = %(customer)s
),
si_so_link AS (
SELECT
    sales_invoice_item.parent AS sales_invoice,
    sales_invoice_item.sales_order
FROM
    `tabSales Invoice Item` sales_invoice_item
INNER JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` sales_invoice
ON
    sales_invoice_item.parent = sales_invoice.name
WHERE
    sales_invoice_item.docstatus = 1
AND
    sales_invoice.docstatus = 1
AND
    sales_invoice_item.qty > 1
AND
    sales_invoice.is_return = 0
AND
    sales_invoice_item.sales_order IS NOT NULL
AND
    sales_invoice_item.sales_order != ''
AND
	sales_invoice.customer = %(customer)s
AND
	sales_invoice.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
    sales_invoice_item.parent
),
custom_vouchers AS (
	SELECT
		'Payment Entry' AS voucher_type,
		name AS voucher_no,
		custom_voucher_type,
		custom_voucher_no
	FROM
		`tabPayment Entry`
	WHERE
		docstatus = 1
	AND
		custom_voucher_type IS NOT NULL
	AND
		posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s		
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		'Journal Entry' AS voucher_type,
		name AS voucher_no,
		custom_voucher_type,
		custom_voucher_no
	FROM
		`tabJournal Entry`
	WHERE
		docstatus = 1
	AND
		custom_voucher_type IS NOT NULL
	AND
		posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
),
sys_gen_gl_entries AS (
	SELECT
		name,
		is_system_generated
	FROM
		`tabJournal Entry`
	WHERE
		docstatus = 1
	AND
		is_system_generated = 1
),
opening_1 AS (
	SELECT
		NULL AS posting_date,
		'Opening' AS voucher_type,
		NULL AS voucher_no,
		SUM(debit) AS debit,
		SUM(credit) AS credit,
		NULL AS remarks
	FROM
		`tabGL Entry`
	WHERE
		 is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		is_opening = 'No'
	AND
		 party_type = 'Customer'
	AND
		 party = %(customer)s
	AND
		 posting_date < %(from_date)s
),
opening_2 AS (
	SELECT
		NULL AS posting_date,
		'Opening' AS voucher_type,
		NULL AS voucher_no,
		SUM(debit) AS debit,
		SUM(credit) AS credit,
		NULL AS remarks
	FROM
		`tabGL Entry`
	WHERE
		 is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		 is_opening = 'Yes'
	AND
		 party_type = 'Customer'
	AND
		 party = %(customer)s
),
opening AS (
	SELECT
		opening.posting_date,
		opening.voucher_type,
		opening.voucher_no,
		IFNULL(SUM(opening.debit), 0) AS debit,
		IFNULL(SUM(opening.credit), 0) AS credit,
		CONCAT('رصيد إفتتاحي - عميل (', customer.customer_name, ')') AS remarks
	FROM
		(
		SELECT * FROM opening_1
		UNION ALL
		SELECT * FROM opening_2
		) opening
    LEFT JOIN
        customer
    ON
        TRUE
	GROUP BY
		opening.posting_date,
		opening.voucher_type,
		opening.voucher_no,
		CONCAT('رصيد إفتتاحي - عميل (', customer.customer_name, ')')
),
transactions AS (
	SELECT
		gl_entry.posting_date,
		IF(custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_type IS NOT NULL, custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_type, gl_entry.voucher_type) AS voucher_type,
		IF(custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_no IS NOT NULL, custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_no, gl_entry.voucher_no) AS voucher_no,
		SUM(debit) AS debit,
		SUM(credit) AS credit,
		remarks
	FROM
		`tabGL Entry` gl_entry
	LEFT JOIN
		custom_vouchers
	ON
		gl_entry.voucher_type = custom_vouchers.voucher_type AND gl_entry.voucher_no = custom_vouchers.voucher_no
	LEFT JOIN
		sys_gen_gl_entries
	ON
		gl_entry.voucher_no = sys_gen_gl_entries.name
	WHERE
		gl_entry.is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		gl_entry.is_opening = 'No'
	AND
		IFNULL(sys_gen_gl_entries.is_system_generated, 0) != 1
	AND
		gl_entry.party_type = 'Customer'
	AND
		gl_entry.party = %(customer)s
	AND
		gl_entry.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
	GROUP BY
		gl_entry.posting_date,
		IF(custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_type IS NOT NULL, custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_type, gl_entry.voucher_type),
		IF(custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_no IS NOT NULL, custom_vouchers.custom_voucher_no, gl_entry.voucher_no)
),
translation AS (
SELECT
    source_text,
    translated_text
FROM
    `tabTranslation`
WHERE
    language = 'ar'
GROUP BY
    source_text
),
opening_and_transactions AS (
    SELECT
    	gl_entry.posting_date,
    	IF(translation.translated_text IS NOT NULL, translation.translated_text, gl_entry.voucher_type) as translated_voucher_type,
    	gl_entry.voucher_no,
    	si_so_link.sales_order,
    	gl_entry.debit,
    	gl_entry.credit,
    	SUM(gl_entry.debit) OVER (ORDER BY gl_entry.posting_date, gl_entry.voucher_no, gl_entry.remarks) - SUM(gl_entry.credit) OVER (ORDER BY gl_entry.posting_date, gl_entry.voucher_no, gl_entry.remarks) AS balance,
    	gl_entry.remarks,
    	customer.customer_name as customer_name,
    	gl_entry.voucher_type
    FROM
    	(
    	SELECT * FROM opening
    	UNION ALL
    	SELECT * FROM transactions
    	) gl_entry
    LEFT JOIN
        customer
    ON
        TRUE
    LEFT JOIN
        translation
    ON
        gl_entry.voucher_type = translation.source_text
    LEFT JOIN
        si_so_link
    ON
        gl_entry.voucher_type = 'Sales Invoice'
        AND gl_entry.voucher_no = si_so_link.sales_invoice
    ORDER BY
    	gl_entry.posting_date,
    	gl_entry.voucher_no
),	
transactions_total AS (
	SELECT
		NULL posting_date,
		'الإجمالي' AS translated_voucher_type,
		NULL AS voucher_no,
		NULL AS sales_order,
		SUM(debit) AS debit,
		SUM(credit) AS credit,
		(SELECT SUM(debit) - SUM(credit) AS balance
		FROM `tabGL Entry`
		WHERE is_cancelled = 0 AND party = %(customer)s AND posting_date <= %(to_date)s) AS balance,
		NULL AS remarks,
		NULL AS customer_name,
		NULL AS voucher_type
	FROM
		`tabGL Entry` gl_entry
	LEFT JOIN
		custom_vouchers
	ON
		gl_entry.voucher_type = custom_vouchers.voucher_type AND gl_entry.voucher_no = custom_vouchers.voucher_no
	LEFT JOIN
		sys_gen_gl_entries
	ON
		gl_entry.voucher_no = sys_gen_gl_entries.name
	WHERE
		gl_entry.is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		gl_entry.is_opening = 'No'
	AND
		IFNULL(sys_gen_gl_entries.is_system_generated, 0) != 1
	AND
		gl_entry.party_type = 'Customer'
	AND
		gl_entry.party = %(customer)s
	AND
		gl_entry.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
)
SELECT * FROM opening_and_transactions
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM transactions_total
